title: ENCODE Project: Functional characterization of regulatory regions and their physical interactions
text:
This is part of the ENCODE FCC Project. In this part, we integrated the STARR/MPRA/CRISPRi/Hi-C assays with genomic annotations of chromatin states (cCREs/ChromHMM) and TF binding sites in order to:

Qualitative analyze the regulatory regions identified in STARR/MPRA/CRISPRi assays
Quantitative analyze the regulatory effects measured in STARR/MPRA/CRISPRi assays
Study the physical interactions of regulatory regions using intact Hi-C assay
